subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The group headed by the Canadian billionaire James L. Balsillie, which is seeking to buy the Phoenix Coyotes and move them to Hamilton, Ontario, increased its bid by $30 million on Monday, bringing the total value of its offer to $242.5 million.
snippet: The group headed by the Canadian billionaire James L. Balsillie, which is seeking to buy the Phoenix Coyotes and move them to Hamilton, Ontario, increased its bid by $30 million on Monday, bringing the total value of its offer to $242.5 million.
